hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:When Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) performed Tawaf of the Ka`ba for Hajj or `Umra, he used to do Ramal during the first three rounds, and in the last four rounds he used to walk; then after the Tawaf he used to offer two rak`at and then performed Tawaf between Safa and Marwa

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ طَافَ بِالْبَيْتِ إِذَا قَدِمَ مَكَّةَ، قَبْلَ أَنْ يَرْجِعَ إِلَى بَيْتِهِ، ثُمَّ صَلَّى رَكْعَتَيْنِ، ثُمَّ خَرَجَ إِلَى الصَّفَا
chapter.eng-name: Tawaf of the Ka'bah on reaching Makkah
